column99: Offshore position in Esbjerg, Denmark  12 hours shift Day shift and night shift will be rotated on every alternate offshore trip Participation in required courses must be expected during home period Start date: As soon as possible  Scope of Work Operate the facilities on a day-to-day basis Ensure operations are executed within operating scope and in accordance with company rules and procedures   Perform the first degree of maintenance   Act as Area Authority, opening at location permit to work (final checks, TBT, Hazard identification, permit to work compliance etc.)     Conduct the daily rounds to monitor the facilities, log data, check integrity threats, check safe operation of third parties)     Prepare and execute isolations and breaking containment verifying and ensuring safety before any work is released   Perform gas, NORM and other testing required to verify equipment is safe to work on for other teams   Perform random audits on working locations   Coordinate the daily production team activities  Qualifications/Experience required Educational background as process technician, skilled craftsman or similar with craftsman diploma 5 years of experience with process, preferably from oil and gas industry Preferably former work experience as Production Operator Good analytical skills, structured and able to follow instructions closely Must be able to communicate effectively in English. Danish is an advantage. Clear focus on HSE Welcome to Semco Maritime Please submit your application as soon as possible if you would like to join our great team. Candidates will be invited for interviews on an ongoing basis. Do not hesitate to contact Recruiter - Anna Dam at  anna@semcomaritime.com  if you have any further questions.
